ygData.subject: RE: Driver Bryggin
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes, the Gnome that comes out of the destroyed Cargo Clockwork is the Cargo Clockwork Driver.  I had a minute to try getting him to talk after some high levels
ygData.messageBody:
Yes, the Gnome that comes out of the destroyed Cargo Clockwork is the Cargo
Clockwork Driver. I had a minute to try getting him to talk after some high
levels killed the clockwork. I tried the standard hails, clicked on him to
see if he sold anything and even mentioned tinkering, but I didn't try
Gimblestan, because after a minute he just disappears. I didn't get him to
open his mouth one bit. I asked the high levels why they didn't attack the
Driver and they said he was too tough for them, even tougher than the Guards
and that he didn't have any loot that they heard of.

Kilkin Copplepot - 28th Gemchopper - Fen Ro


-----Original Message-----
From: trond ivar hansen [mailto:zafigomchic@...]
Sent: Monday, October 25, 1999 8:10 AM
To: EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com
Subject: [EQ_Tinkering] Driver Bryggin

From: trond ivar hansen <zafigomchic@...>

Well, I don?t know if this has anything at all to do
with tinkering, but I?ll post it here in case any of
you have the resources and contacts to check it out.

You see, the other day as I was on my way in Steamfont
to try out the new tinkering recipies, I met the Cargo
clockwork on it?s way to the windmills. (It was that
big one that usually stands beside the entrance to
Ak?Anon).

As I came closer I saw an ogre player beating on it,
and I waited till he finished, to hear from him what
loot he?d get. He killed it, and to my big surprise a
gnome appeared from under the corpse. His name was
driver Bryggin, and it seems he is driving the Cargo
clockwork.

Before I could hail him the ogre started killing him
too. The gnome beat hard so the ogre had to flee, but
the gnome died anyway. I guess the ogre had cast a DoT
spell on it or something. With the ogre away I looted
the corpses, but they had nothing valuable. The
clockwork had scrap metal and the gnome had a rusty
dagger.
So my question is, has any of you ever tried to hail
Driver Bryggin? Could he have a quest, or even be a
merchant? Anyone interested in checking? I surely
don?t want to get messed up factins in Ak?Anon by
killing the clockwork myself.

Piip Ignatz
Gnome rogue of the 30th grade
Innoruuk
